Tests that the hint displays properly on a UI.TextPrompt with autocomplete.
Requesting completions
Text:testT
TextWithCurrentSuggestion:testT

Text:testT
TextWithCurrentSuggestion:testTextPrompt

Text:testTe
TextWithCurrentSuggestion:testTextPrompt

Requesting completions

TextWithCurrentSuggestion:testTextPrompt

Requesting completions
